project_descr: This project will prioritize essential harm reduction services for people who inject drugs, prisons programs for Men with high risk behavior and women with high risk behavior. Treatment, care and support will be provided for all people living with HIV.

outputs.output_descr: Essential prevention services provided to key populations, on-going services provision scaled up to new provinces. Comprehensive harm reduction services for PWID, harm reduction for PWID in prisons with plans to introduce OST (currently needle and syringe programs are not allowed in prisons), programs for MHRB and WHRB. Treatment, care and support will be provided for all people living with HIV (PLHIV).
donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS

document_name: HIV Population Size Estimation and Mapping in Seven Cities of Afghanistan, Ref# UNDP/AFG/RFP/2018/0000001950
project_title: scaling up hiv interventions among key affected population (kap)
